title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist in a Java file, if there are no suggestions available, the file is still marked as modified.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as modified.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a Java file. 2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. 3. Press Ctrl+Space to trigger code assist.
